Monday, April 24, 2023.Breakfast: Chorizo and Potato Breakfast Tacos - Scrambled eggs, diced chorizo, and potatoes on corn tortillas, topped with salsa and cheese
Monday, April 24, 2023.Lunch: French Niçoise Salad - Green beans, boiled eggs, tomatoes, olives, and tuna with a tangy mustard vinaigrette

Monday, April 24, 2023.Dessert: Chocolate Mousse - Rich and creamy chocolate mousse topped with whipped cream and fresh raspberries

Tuesday, April 25, 2023.Breakfast: Spanish Tortilla - A traditional Spanish omelette with thinly sliced potatoes and onions
Tuesday, April 25, 2023.Lunch: Beef and Vegetable Stir-Fry - Marinated beef slices with mixed vegetables cooked in a wok, served over rice
Tuesday, April 25, 2023.Dinner: Pressure Cooker Coq au Vin - Classic French dish of chicken cooked in red wine with mushrooms and onions, served with crusty bread
Tuesday, April 25, 2023.Dessert: Tarte Tatin - Caramelized apple tart served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream

Wednesday, April 26, 2023.Breakfast: Croissant Breakfast Sandwich - Ham, Swiss cheese, and a fried egg on a freshly baked croissant

Wednesday, April 26, 2023.Dessert: Basque Burnt Cheesecake - Rustic, caramelized cheesecake with a creamy interior

Thursday, April 27, 2023.Breakfast: Quiche Lorraine - Egg, bacon, and Gruyère cheese baked in a flaky pastry crust
Thursday, April 27, 2023.Lunch: Cuban Sandwich - Layers of roasted pork, ham, Swiss cheese, pickles, and mustard on a pressed roll
Thursday, April 27, 2023.Dinner: Fideuà - Spanish Noodle Paella with Chicken

Saturday, April 29, 2023.Lunch: Shakshuka - Spicy tomato and pepper sauce with poached eggs, topped with crumbled feta cheese and fresh cilantro

Sunday, April 30, 2023.Lunch: Chicken Shawarma Wrap - Marinated and grilled chicken in a wrap with garlic sauce, tomatoes, and lettuce
Sunday, April 30, 2023.Dinner: Greek Lemon Chicken and Potatoes - Marinated and roasted chicken with lemon, garlic, and oregano, served alongside tender roasted potatoes and a side of Greek salad.
